Episodes.Title: eps1.0_hellofriend.mov
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: A notorious hacker takes an interest in cyber security engineer and vigilante styled computer hacker Elliot, while an evil corporation is hacked.

Episodes.Title: eps1.1_ones-and-zer0es.mpeg
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: Elliot is hesitant about fsociety and is offered a new job. Elliot worries about Shayla's association with Fernando Vera; Ollie is given a CD outside of Allsafe. Mr. Robot makes Elliot talk about his father.

Episodes.Title: eps1.2_d3bug.mkv
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: Elliot tries to live a bug-free life, but is quickly drawn back in. Tyrell takes matters into his own hands when the CTO position becomes available; Ollie gets blackmailed. Gideon starts getting suspicious of the infected server.

Episodes.Title: eps1.3_da3m0ns.mp4
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: While dealing with his withdrawal, Elliot suffers a series of hallucinations about his life, while Shayla helps Angela take an unexpected trip.

Episodes.Title: eps1.4_3xpl0its.wmv
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: Fsociety attempts to penetrate Steel Mountain, the most secure data facility in America, while Angela makes an important decision.

Episodes.Title: eps1.5_br4ve-trave1er.asf
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: Elliot attempts to hack Vera out of jail in order to save someone he cares about; Tyrell's "game" gets crazy; and Angela digs deeper into her mother's death.

Episodes.Title: eps1.6_v1ew-s0urce.flv
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: Elliot misses Shayla. Angela makes a deal with Colby. Sharon Knowles has an encounter with Tyrell.

Episodes.Title: eps1.7_wh1ter0se.m4v
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: Allsafe is hacked and Elliot is meeting Whiterose. Tyrell is interrogated by the police and Elliot remembers who he really is.

Episodes.Title: eps1.8_m1rr0r1ng.qt
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: Elliot has to face the challenges of his past, and become accustomed to his new found family.

Episodes.Title: eps1.9_zer0-day.avi
Episodes.Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday
Episodes.Plot: Another huge discovery for Elliot surrounding his family and fsociety, Tyrell's world starts to close around him and Angela has a rather unexpected visitor.
